Studded armour, short bow, arrows ×12, daggers
×2, footman’s mace, arrow quiver, backpack,
bandages, chalk (piece), flute, ink and quill,
parchment ×3, soft leather pouch, iron rations
(1 week), hemp rope (50-ft.), large sack, tinderbox,
torches ×2, wineskin (full), spell book, and
1d4+1 gold pieces.
